title: Emerald Blossom Jhumka: Classic Elegance, Modern Sparkle
materials: Cultured Pearl Drop. Features a high-quality Hyderabadi polish for a lasting luster.
features: Features a teardrop-shaped emerald as the primary stone, surrounded by a delicate halo of sparkling CZ stones. Intricate filigree detailing on the 'jhumka' (bell) part creates a captivating pattern. The floral motif connector adds a touch of contemporary design to the classic jhumka shape. The pearl drop adds a traditional touch and graceful movement.
colors: Predominantly gold with vibrant green from the emerald
and a soft white from the pearls and CZ stones.
occasions: and special occasions. Ideal for pairing with traditional South Indian attire like Kanjeevaram sarees
or to add an ethnic touch to contemporary outfits.
description: This 'Jhumka' design blends traditional South Indian artistry with modern design aesthetics. The high-quality CZ stones provide brilliance and sparkle, making it a stunning piece. The emerald is selected for its color and clarity, and the Hyderabadi polish ensures a long-lasting shine. Represents good luck and prosperity, making it an auspicious gift.
